mapper.sql: SELECT id, no, name, nick_name 'nickName', post_code 'postCode', county, address, phone_number 'phoneNumber', email, remark, ems_no 'emsNo', total_price totalPrice, goods_json 'goodsJson', create_time 'createTime' FROM `order`
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` ( no, name, nick_name, post_code, county, address, phone_number, email, remark, ems_no, total_price, goods_json, create_time ) VALUES ( #{no}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{postCode}, #{county}, #{address}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{remark}, #{emsNo}, #{totalPrice}, #{goodsJson}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT id, no, name, email, ems_no 'emsNo', total_price totalPrice, create_time 'createTime' FROM `order` LIMIT #{start}, #{limit}
mapper.update: UPDATE `order` SET no = #{no}, name = #{name}, nick_name = #{nickName}, post_code = #{postCode}, county = #{county}, address = #{address}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, email = #{email}, remark = #{remark}, ems_no = #{emsNo}, total_price = #{totalPrice}, goods_json = #{goodsJson}, create_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
